description: Try our easy to follow Marshmallows recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Marshmallow,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Marshmallows Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2-4 drops red food colouring (or green food colouring)

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line an 18x28cm slice pan with baking paper. Allow sides to overhang.
Place sugar into a small saucepan and add 1/3 of a cup of hot water. Stir over a medium-low heat for 5 minutes until sugar has dissolved. Remove from heat.

Place 1/3 cup of warm water in a bowl. Sprinkle over gelatine and whisk until combined. Add the gelatine mixture to the sugar syrup. Return saucepan to heat and stir for 3 minutes until gelatine has completely dissolved and the syrup is clear. Transfer the syrup to a bowl of mixer and allow to cool for 10 minutes.

Beat syrup on high for 10 minutes or until mixture has turned white and is thick and glossy. Add either rosewater and drops of red food colouring or peppermint and drops of green food colouring and beat until just combined.
Working quickly, transfer mixture to prepared pan and smooth surface. Set aside to set. Do not refrigerate.
Lift out marshmallow. Cut into pieces with a wet knife. Place sugar into a bowl and toss in marshmallow to coat.
